abstract: Cash-rich companies like Microsoft and Cisco should hardly need to borrow. But a tax hit on bringing overseas balances to the United States coupled with ultralow interest rates at home make raising debt a cheap way to get cash at headquarters, says Reuters Breakingviews.

headline.main: Raising Debt a Cheap Way to Drum Up Cash
